homepage_top_guides_header: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji, sprawdź nasze przewodniki.
homepage_scheduled_maintenance_operation: A maintenance operation is scheduled for the BHS1 region on the 19th of September 2018 between 3:00 and 8:00 UTC-4. No disturbance is to be expected on your instances, only some APIs of this region will be unreachable during the duration of the operation
homepage_apac_regions_availability_messa: Dostępne są nowe regiony Public Cloud:  Singapur (SGP) i Sydney, Australia (SYD)
